org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf

Interface InputPreProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseInputPreProcessor, BinomialSamplingPreProcessor, CnnToFeedForwardPreProcessor, ComposableInputPreProcessor, FeedForwardToCnnPreProcessor, FeedForwardToRnnPreProcessor, ReshapePreProcessor, RnnToFeedForwardPreProcessor, UnitVarianceProcessor, ZeroMeanAndUnitVariancePreProcessor, ZeroMeanPrePreProcessor

    public interface InputPreProcessor
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Input pre processor used for pre processing input before passing it to the neural network.

        Pre preProcess input/activations for a multi layer network

      • backprop

        org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray backprop(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray output,
                                            Layer layer)
        Reverse the preProcess during backprop. Process Gradient/epsilons before passing them to the layer below.
        Parameters:
        output - which is a pair of the gradient and epsilon
        Returns:
        the reverse of the pre preProcess step (if any)
